name: Cyborgs
effect_text: All members of the Warband can purchase 1 additional piece of equipment costing 1 point for free

name: Undead
effect_text: When a model's hit points are reduced to 0 for the first time, bring the model back to 1 Wounds

name: Horrible Chorus
effect_text: All models in this warband gain Horrible Scream for free. Cannot purchase equipment. Nonleaders cannot purchase other Psychic Powers. Each model may use Horrible Scream once per round.

name: Blood Thirsty
effect_text: Once per round, when an enemy within LoS drops to or below half Wounds, one model may make a free Move or Charge toward that enemy and a free Fight action

name: Combat Drugs
effect_text: Once per round, one model may gain +2 to one roll of their choice, then gains 1 Horror. If the roll is successful, the model may also immediately make a free Move action.

name: Overwatch Protocol
effect_text: Once per round, after an enemy finishes a Move in LoS of two or more allied models, one model may make a free Shoot action at âˆ’1. If the attack hits, the target gains 1 Horror token.

name: Augmented
effect_text: Models may reroll 1s on Fight or Shoot rolls (choose at creation).

name: Relentless Fury
effect_text: When a model fails a Fight roll, it may reroll the attack. If the reroll also fails, it may reroll a third time, but gains 1 Horror for each reroll.

name: Brutal Precision
effect_text: Models gain +2 to Fight rolls against Engaged enemies. Additionally, when a model takes an enemy Out of Action in Engage, it may immediately make a free Move 1 action.

name: Opportunists
effect_text: Once per round, when an enemy model is taken Out of Action, one nearby ally may immediately make a free Shoot or Fight action.

name: Clear Orders
effect_text: Once per round, a model may remove Exhausted at the end of its activation but gains 1 Horror. This may be done even if the model was already activated this round.
